Title: Chapter IV: Two Tigers Subdue Dragons
Writer: Alfred Gough (created by), Miles Millar (created by), Alfred Gough, Miles Millar, Michael Jones-Morales
Actors: Daniel Wu, Orla Brady, Sarah Bolger, Aramis Knight
Plot: Sunny and M.K. try to figure out how to control the boy's power, while Quinn sets a dangerous parlay with a rival Baron to help fight The Widow.
